summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1578, for the improvement of Crescent Drive, from Twenty-fourth Avenue North to a point one hundred (100) feet west of the west line of Pine Court, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by laying water mains therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all gates, tees, crosses, fire hydrants and other appurtenances necessary for the reasonable water service and fire protection of said district, under Ordinance No. 16483, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
